EmailTemplate.name: Bed Out Of Order
EmailTemplate.subject: Bed Out Of Order Alert for {!Bed__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team ,
This Bed No. {!Bed__c.Name} Needs Maintenance.
Please find the details of the maintenance needs below: {!Bed__c.Enter_details_of_the_maintenance_needs__c}
Thanks
Admin
